'''Photographer of Teyvat Part II''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 2.8]].

==Event Duration==
July 15, 2022 – August 11, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)<br />
Results and Winners List Announcement:<br />
The list of winners will be updated in this event post on August 22, 2022. Winners will be notified via forum messages, please stay tuned for official announcements.

==Event Details==
===WEEK 1: Let's Go Stargazing ✨===
{{Description|I heard that there is a romantic sea of stars over the Golden Apple Archipelago, have you found it?}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/6016569
* Event Duration
** July 15, 2022 – July 21, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate:
** Post your photo of the starry sky in the comments section of this post and you will be considered a successful participant. Please refer to the format below when commenting.
** Comment Format:<br />Teyvat location:<br />Teyvat time:<br />I would love to go stargazing with ___.
* Event Rewards
** After the end of the event, 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted their comment according to the requirements to receive 300 Primogems each.

===WEEK 2: Call of the Hilichurls===
{{Description|Bring musical notes/instruments to gather with the hilichurls!}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/6130840
* Event Duration
** July 22, 2022 – July 28, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate:
** During the event, post photos with musical elements in the comments section.
* Event Rewards
** After the end of the event, 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted their comment according to the requirements to receive 300 Primogems each.

===WEEK 3: Say Cheese at the Castle===
{{Description|Posing for photos is a piece of cake!}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/6289433
* Event Duration
** July 29, 2022 – August 4, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate
*# Simply leave a comment in the comments section of this post to share a photo that you took at the castle.
*# Photos with excellent composition and extraordinary poses will have more opportunities to be selected!
* Event Rewards
** After the end of the event, 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted their comment according to the requirements to receive 300 Primogems each.

===WEEK 4: Master Bonsai Designer===
{{Description|Bonsai design is practically child's play for our talented Travelers...}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/6657087
* Event Duration
** August 5, 2022 – August 11, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate
** Share your photo of the bonsai and island designs using the topic #Photographer of Teyvat and tell us which is your favorite island!
* Event Rewards
** After the end of the event, 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive 100 Primogems each.

==Notes==
# Please go to My Information > Information Management > Game Information Management > Genshin Impact to fill in your Genshin Impact UID ahead of time. If winning Travelers have not filled in their UID after the results are announced, they will be deemed to have forfeited their Primogems reward.
# Each user has only one chance to win a prize in each event. The results of the two events are independent of each other.
# The following situations will be considered invalid participation:
## The content of the post violates Community Rules, or plagiarized, or misappropriated content from other authors.
## Publishing content unrelated to the theme of the event, content that contain any form of advertising, and those which seek to spread malicious rumors or discredit the game and its characters.
# After the list of winners is announced, if the winner deletes the post of the winning work, the winner will be deemed to have voluntarily forfeited their prize.
# Each HoYoLAB account can win only one merchandise prize during the event.
